# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than $150 to you. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $200. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to hearing from you soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
